    content: ".";
    display: block;
    height: 0;
    clear: both;
    visibility: hidden;
}

  font-weight: normal;
  font-style: normal;
}
.fa {
  display: inline-block;
  font-family: FontAwesome;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: normal;
  line-height: 1;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}
/* makes the font 33% larger relative to the icon container */
.fa-lg {
  font-size: 1.3333333333333333em;
  line-height: 0.75em;
  vertical-align: -15%;
}
.fa-2x {
  font-size: 2em;
}
.fa-3x {
  font-size: 3em;
}
.fa-4x {
  font-size: 4em;
}
.fa-5x {
  font-size: 5em;
}
.fa-fw {
  width: 1.2857142857142858em;
  text-align: center;
}
.fa-ul {
  padding-left: 0;
  margin-left: 2.142857142857143em;
  list-style-type: none;
}
.fa-ul > li {
  position: relative;
}
.fa-li {
  position: absolute;
  left: -2.142857142857143em;
  width: 2.142857142857143em;
  top: 0.14285714285714285em;
  text-align: center;
}
.fa-li.fa-lg {
  left: -1.8571428571428572em;
}
.fa-border {
  padding: .2em .25em .15em;
  border: solid 0.08em #eeeeee;
  border-radius: .1em;
}
.pull-right {
  float: right;
}
.pull-left {
  float: left;
}
.fa.pull-left {
  margin-right: .3em;
}
.fa.pull-right {
  margin-left: .3em;
}
.fa-spin {
  -webkit-animation: spin 2s infinite linear;
  -moz-animation: spin 2s infinite linear;
  -o-animation: spin 2s infinite linear;
  animation: spin 2s infinite linear;
}
@-moz-keyframes spin {
  0% {
    -moz-transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    -moz-transform: rotate(359deg);
  }
}
@-webkit-keyframes spin {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(359deg);
  }
}
@-o-keyframes spin {
  0% {
    -o-transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    -o-transform: rotate(359deg);
  }
}
@-ms-keyframes spin {
  0% {
    -ms-transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    -ms-transform: rotate(359deg);
  }
}
@keyframes spin {
  0% {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    transform: rotate(359deg);
  }
}
.fa-rotate-90 {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=1);
  -webkit-transform: rotate(90deg);
  -moz-transform: rotate(90deg);
  -ms-transform: rotate(90deg);
  -o-transform: rotate(90deg);
  transform: rotate(90deg);
}
.fa-rotate-180 {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=2);
  -webkit-transform: rotate(180deg);
  -moz-transform: rotate(180deg);
  -ms-transform: rotate(180deg);
  -o-transform: rotate(180deg);
  transform: rotate(180deg);
}
.fa-rotate-270 {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=3);
  -webkit-transform: rotate(270deg);
  -moz-transform: rotate(270deg);
  -ms-transform: rotate(270deg);
  -o-transform: rotate(270deg);
  transform: rotate(270deg);
}
.fa-flip-horizontal {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=0, mirror=1);
  -webkit-transform: scale(-1, 1);
  -moz-transform: scale(-1, 1);
  -ms-transform: scale(-1, 1);
  -o-transform: scale(-1, 1);
  transform: scale(-1, 1);
}
.fa-flip-vertical {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=2, mirror=1);
  -webkit-transform: scale(1, -1);
  -moz-transform: scale(1, -1);
  -ms-transform: scale(1, -1);
  -o-transform: scale(1, -1);
  transform: scale(1, -1);
}
.fa-stack {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
  width: 2em;
  height: 2em;
  line-height: 2em;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.fa-stack-1x,
.fa-stack-2x {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
}
.fa-stack-1x {
  line-height: inherit;
}
.fa-stack-2x {
  font-size: 2em;
}
.fa-inverse {
  color: #ffffff;
}

     background-color:yellow;

		c0-0.986-0.535-1.895-1.397-2.372L17.109,2.134z M10.87,9.106c-0.133,0-0.248-0.089-0.281-0.218
		c-0.033-0.128,0.024-0.263,0.141-0.327l4.044-2.241c0.726-0.401,1.606-0.401,2.332,0l4.043,2.241
		c0.117,0.064,0.176,0.198,0.143,0.327c-0.033,0.129-0.148,0.218-0.281,0.218H10.87z"/>
</g>
</svg>






<i class="fa fa-wrench"></i>






<i class="fa fa-wrench fa-2x"></i>






! Introduction

The tabContents macro displays a list of tiddlers, and part of their contents, related to the current one.

! Content and Attributes

|!Attribute |!Description |
|type |The type of the tiddlers to display. Example: if the tiddlers are tagged ''$:/_type/xyz'', then `type` is ''xyz''.|
|header |The name of the [[widget message|WidgetMessages]] to send when the button is clicked |
|filter |The filter applied to the ListWidget used by the macro to display the tiddlers. Default: "[all[current]listed[]!is[system]tag[$:/_type/comment]!has[draft.of]nsort[title]] [all[current]!is[system]listed[source]tag[$:/_type/comment]!has[draft.of]] +[nsort[title]]" |







! Introduction

The tabSlider macro displays a slider button that shows a form and a button to add a new tiddler related to the current one.

! Content and Attributes

|!Attribute |!Description |
|type |The type of the tiddlers to display. Example: if the tiddlers are tagged ''$:/_type/xyz'', then `type` is ''xyz''.|
|header |The header for the table. |
|addLabel |The label for the add button. |
|addTooltip |The tooltip for the add button. |
|addClass |CSS class for the add button. |
|cancelTooltip |The tooltip for the cancel button. |
|cancelLabel |The label for the cancel button. |



































































<span title="Enter Filter Expression"><$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/filter" field="filter"/></span>


<$list filter="[tag[$:/_trash]]">

<$button message="tw-delete-tiddler" param={{!!title}} class="btn-invisible btn-mini">{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}</$button> {{!!title}} 
</$list>

<$list filter={{$:/temp/filter!!filter}}>

<$button message="tw-delete-tiddler" param={{!!title}} class="btn-invisible btn-mini">{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}</$button> {{!!title}} 
</$list>

tab-content-blue:#F6F6FF
tab-content-red:#FFEEEE












\define cell(XY)
<$reveal type="match" state="!!edit" text="agenda">
    <$edit-text tiddler="$:/_tw-scholars/courses/agenda/data" field="$XY$" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="8"/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!edit" text="agenda">
    <$tiddler tiddler="$:/_tw-scholars/courses/agenda/data">
        <$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!$XY$" text="">
            <$button to={{!!$XY$}}>
                <$view field="$XY$"/>
            </$button>
        </$reveal>
    </$tiddler>
</$reveal>
\end
\define button()
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!edit" text="agenda">
    <$button set="!!edit" setTo="agenda" class="btn-invisible">{{$:/_images/edit-2x}}</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state="!!edit" text="agenda">
    <$button set="!!edit" setTo="" class="btn-invisible">{{$:/_images/done-2x}}</$button>
</$reveal>
\end

<hr>
<div class="btn-big green"><<trad "started">></div>
<$list filter="[tag[$:/_type/course]has[date_alpha]!date_alpha[]date_omega[]each[course]]" emptyMessage=<<trad "none">>>
    <span style="text-transform:capitalize;">
    <h1><$view field="course"/></h1>
    </span>
    <$list filter="[course{!!course}has[date_alpha]!date_alpha[]date_omega[]]">
        <h2><$link><$view field="title"/></$link></h2>
    </$list>   
</$list>

<div class="btn-big grey"><<trad "not started">></div>
<$list filter="[tag[$:/_type/course]date_alpha[]each[course]]" emptyMessage=<<trad "none">>>
    <span style="text-transform:capitalize;">
    <h1><$view field="course"/></h1>
    </span>
    <$list filter="[course{!!course}date_alpha[]]">
        <h2><$link><$view field="title"/></$link></h2>
    </$list>   
</$list>

<div class="btn-big red"><<trad "ended">></div>
<$list filter="[tag[$:/_type/course]!date_omega[]each[course]]" emptyMessage=<<trad "none">> >
    <span style="text-transform:capitalize;">
    <h1><$view field="course"/></h1>
    </span>
    <$list filter="[course{!!course}!date_omega[]]">
        <h2><$link><$view field="title"/></$link></h2>
    </$list>   
</$list>






<hr>
<div>
<$list filter="[tag[$:/_type/ressource]each[ressource_type]]">
    <span style="text-transform:capitalize;">
        <h1><$view field="ressource_type" style=""/></h1>
    </span>
    <$list filter="[{!!ressource_type}listed[ressource_type]!has[draft.of]]">
        <h2><$link><$view field="title"/></$link> <small>(<$view field="courses"/>)</small></h2>
    </$list>   
</$list>
</div>






\define machin(course,student)
<$list filter="[[$course$]listed[student_courses]person_name[$student$]limit[1]]">
{{$:/_images/done}}
</$list>
\end
<hr>
<table class="agenda">
    <tr>
        <td></td>
<$list filter="[tag[$:/_type/course]!has[draft.of]sort[title]]">
        <td><$link><$view field="title"/></$link></td>
</$list>
    </tr>
<$list filter="[tag[$:/_type/person]person_type[student]!has[draft.of]sort[title]]">
<$set name="student" value={{!!title}}>
    <tr>
    <th style="text-align:left;padding:0.5em 0.5em 0.5em 0.5em;width:30%;">{{$:/_images/person}}  <$link><$view field="title"/></$link></th>
<$list filter="[tag[$:/_type/course]!has[draft.of]sort[title]]">
<$set name="course" value={{!!title}}>
    <td><$macrocall $name="machin" course=<<course>> student=<<student>> /></td>
</$set>
</$list>
    </tr>
</$set>
</$list>
</table>

	margin:0px;padding:0px;
	width:100%;

	border:1px solid #ffffff;

	-webkit-border-bottom-left-radius:0px;
	border-bottom-left-radius:0px;
	
	-moz-border-radius-bottomright:0px;
	-webkit-border-bottom-right-radius:0px;
	border-bottom-right-radius:0px;
	
	-moz-border-radius-topright:0px;
	-webkit-border-top-right-radius:0px;
	border-top-right-radius:0px;
	
	-moz-border-radius-topleft:0px;
	-webkit-border-top-left-radius:0px;
	border-top-left-radius:0px;
}

    border-collapse: collapse;
        border-spacing: 0;
	width:100%;
	height:100%;
	margin:0px;padding:0px;
}

	border-bottom-right-radius:0px;
}

	border: none;
}

.sidebar-menu-recent .button-pressed {
}

.sidebar-menu-newHere {
}







If you want //~TiddlyWiki for Scholars// in your own language: 

# duplicate the french dictionary [[$:/languages/fr-FR/myTabs]], 
# change its title to match your UI current language (`$:/languages/ja-JP/myTabs` for Japanese),
# translate its content.






For example, if you want a journal tab for books' tiddlers (to record your reading process):

# Create a new tiddler with a title like `$:/_tab/journal`:
#* Add the contents you want to show through this tab tiddler.
#* Add a `caption` field with a value like `Journal`.

# Edit the tiddler [[$:/_tw-scholars/tabs]] and add `$:/_tab/journal` to the list field `book`.







Since this tiddlywiki is centered on authors and their publications, the best way to begin is by creating authors' tiddlers.

# Open the tab `Create` in the right sidebar.
# Click the button {{$:/_images/person}}+ and a form will show up.
# Fill the form and click the big green button on the right.

Then, go to one of the author's tiddler you've just created and click on the tabs bar in the bottom right corner of the tiddler. Choose, for instance, the publications tab with the following icon: {{$:/_images/article}} <small>0</small>

# Next to the `Publications` heading, there's a `+` button on the right. Click on it.
# Two radio buttons allows you to choose between `book` and `article`.
# Fill the form and click the `add` button.

Proceed the same way for adding biographical elements, notes, comments, thoughts, etc.






The title and subtitle of this TiddlyWiki can be changed from the tab "Basics" of the control panel. You open the control panel with the cog button {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/control-panel}} in the sidebar. 






By default, tabs are blue. To have them in other colors, like here, add to your tiddler the field `tabs_color` and set the color you want. Available colors are `blue`, `red` and `yellow`. If you want to add another one, edit [[$:/_tw-scholars/css/mytabs]].

If you don't like the colors here and want to define your own blue, red, and yellow colors, edit [[$:/_tw-scholars/colors]].






Tiddlers tagged `$:/_hide/tabs` do not display the tabs bar.






//~TiddlyWiki for Scholars// is not a plugin you can add to your own tiddlywiki and start working. The easiest way to start is by downloading an empty copy of this tiddlywiki:

<$button message="tw-save-wiki" title={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}} class="btn-big-green" style="margin-left:20px;">
Download
</$button>

The hard way is to copy all the system tiddlers and the plugins to your own tiddlywiki. All the system tiddlers you need to copy share the prefix `$:/_tw-scholars/`. The plugins needed for contents creation are [[$:/plugins/matabele/maketid]] and [[$:/plugins/matabele/setfield]] from Matabele, and the macro [[$:/macros/skeeve/dateTime.js]] from Stephan Hradek.






The type of contents of a tiddler (different from its `type` field) is defined by a tag prefixed `$:/_type/`, as in `$:/_type/quote` and `$:/_type/comment`.

''Adding a new content type'' is as simple as tagging a tiddler with the type you want. For example, if you want tiddlers dedicated to videogames: 

# first, create a new tiddler tagged `$:/_type/videogame`; 
# then, edit [[$:/_tw-scholars/tabs]], add the field `videogame` and fill it with your list of tags;
# done! (all the tiddlers tagged `$:/_type/videogame` will display the tabs listed in [[$:/_tw-scholars/tabs]].

''Defining subtypes'' is easy too. If you want different lists of tabs for different types of videogames:

# add to your tiddlers the field `videogame_type` with the subtypes as values: strategy, arcade, RPG, shoot 'em up…
#  edit [[$:/_tw-scholars/tabs]], add the fields `arcade`, `strategy`, etc., and fill them with your lists of tags;
# done!







These are the tabs predefined in //~TiddlyWiki for Scholars//:

<div class="deuxcolonnes">

{{{ [all[tiddlers]prefix[$:/_tw-scholars/tab/]] +[sort[title]] }}}

</div>







These are the tiddlers contents types in use in //~TiddlyWiki for Scholars//:

<div class="troiscolonnes">

{{{ [all[tiddlers]tags[]prefix[$:/_type/]] +[sort[title]] }}}

</div>







*;The list of tabs for each tiddler is stored on a field in [[$:/_tw-scholars/tabs]]. 
:The name of that field is directly related to the contents type of the tiddler. For example, if a tiddler is tagged `$:/_type/quote` its corresponding tabs list in [[$:/_tw-scholars/tabs]] would be the `quote` field. And the corresponding tabs list for tiddlers tagged `$:/_type/idea` is the `idea` field in [[$:/_tw-scholars/tabs]].

*;It is possible to define subtypes for a tiddler contents type.
:Tiddlers tagged `$:/_type/person` have two predefined subtypes: "author" and "student". And tiddlers tagged `$:/_type/publication` can be a "book" or an "article". To define different lists of tabs for each subtype, we use fields like `person_type` and `publication_type`. For instance, tiddlers tagged `$:/_type/person` and with the field `person_type: author` have their list of tabs stored in the field `author` of [[$:/_tw-scholars/tabs]].

*;It is possible to show a list of tabs that do not correspond to the tiddlers type.
:The value of the field `tabs_list` takes precedence over the tiddlers type and subtype. So, for example, to see the tabs of a quote tiddler in a tiddler tagged `$:/_type/comment`, it is enough to create the field `tabs_list` with the value: "quote".

*;It is possible to add tabs to a predefined list using tags.
:To add a tab to the tabs list of a single tiddler, it is enough to tag this tiddler with the title of the tab. All the tabs have the prefix `$:/_tw-scholars/tab/`. For instance: `$:/_tw-scholars/tab/biography`, `$:/_tw-scholars/tab/journal`, etc.

*;It is possible to hide all the tabs with a tag.
:{{$:/_tw-scholars/doc/howTo/hideTabs}} 

*;It is possible to change the color of the tabs.
:{{$:/_tw-scholars/doc/howTo/changeColor}}

*;How to change the tabs bar appearance and functions.
:The tabs bar functionnality is generated by [[$:/_tw-scholars/ViewTemplate/tabs]].
:The tabs bar appearance is controled by [[$:/_tw-scholars/css/mytabs]].







<div class="yellow-box">

It is possible to select the language of most of the user interface elements specific to //~TiddlyWiki for Scholars//.

For example, if you change the current language in the control panel to french, you will see the tabs captions and headings translated into french, as well as the rest of the UI.

This is done via the macro `<<trad>>` ([[$:/_tw-scholars/macros/language]]) which seeks the translation (if any) in the dictionary (if any) corresponding to the current UI language ([[$:/languages/fr-FR/myTabs]]).

</div>






<span style="margin-left: -100px;">

<$list filter="[all[current]listed[parent]!has[draft.of]sort[description]]">

<$macrocall $name="slider" caption={{!!description}} body={{!!title}} heading="h3" btn-style="margin-left:1em" state="slider"/>

</$list>

</span>






<div class="">

<div class="important">

The code of the macros have changed and this documentation is no longer up to date.

It will be updated soon.

</div>

! Introduction

The [[slider and accordion macros|$:/_tw-scholars/macros/slider+accordion]] hide or show their content when clicked.The only difference is their behaviour when using several sliders on the same page:

* The `<<slider>>` macro creates one state tiddler for each new slider, so they can be opened/closed independently of one another;
* The `<<accordion>>` macro uses a single state tiddler for all the sliders on the same page, thus only one can be open at a time.

They also show next to the caption a link `…` to the original tiddler (if there's one).

! Content and Attributes

The content of the `<<slider>>` and `<<accordion>>` macros is displayed according to the rules given above.

<!--
|!Attribute |!Description |
|caption |The slider caption |
|body |The contents to be shown or hidden. If it is a tiddlers' title, its content is transcluded, else it is displayed as is |
|heading |The heading level of the slider (defaults to "h1") |
|tooltip1 |Show tooltip (defaults to "Click to show the contents of this slider") |
|tooltip2 |Hide tooltip (defaults to "Click to hide") |
|tooltip3 |Edit tooltip (defaults to "Edit this section") |
|state |Set to "popup" to delete the state tiddler on each startup (defaults to "slider") |
|retain |Set to "yes" to force the content to be retained even when hidden (defaults to "no")|
|animate |Set to "yes" to animate opening and closure (defaults to "no") |
|btn-class |The div class to be applied to the slider button (defaults to "invisible") |
|btn-style |The span style to be applied to the slider button (defaults to "") |
|body-class |The div class to be applied to the body (defaults to "") |
|body-style |The span class to be applied to the slider button (defaults to "") |
|aria-label-show |Optional Accessibility label for the show button (defaults to "") |
|aria-label-hide |Optional Accessibility label for the hide button (defaults to "") |
|aria-label-link |Optional Accessibility label for the link (defaults to "") |
-->

<table>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <td>Attribute</td>
            <td>Description</td>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td>caption</td>
            <td>The slider caption</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>body</td>
            <td>The contents to be shown or hidden</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>heading</td>
            <td>Optional heading level of the slider (defaults to "h1")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>tooltip1</td>
            <td>Optional show tooltip (defaults to "Click to show the contents of this slider")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>tooltip2</td>
            <td>Optional hide tooltip (defaults to "Click to hide")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>tooltip3</td>
            <td>Optional edit tooltip (defaults to "Edit this section")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>state</td>
            <td>Set to "popup" to delete the state tiddler on each startup (defaults to "slider")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>retain</td>
            <td>Set to "yes" to force the content to be retained even when hidden (defaults to "no")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>animate</td>
            <td>Set to "yes" to animate opening and closure (defaults to "no")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>btn-class</td>
            <td>Optional div class to be applied to the slider button (defaults to "")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>btn-style</td>
            <td>Optional span style to be applied to the slider button (defaults to "")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>body-class</td>
            <td>Optional div class to be applied to the body (defaults to "")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>body-style</td>
            <td>Optional span class to be applied to the slider button (defaults to "")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>aria-label-show</td>
            <td>Optional Accessibility label for the show button (defaults to "")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>aria-label-hide</td>
            <td>Optional Accessibility label for the hide button (defaults to "")</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>aria-label-link</td>
            <td>Optional Accessibility label for the link (defaults to "")</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

Retaining the content when hidden can give poor performance since the hidden content requires refresh processing even though it is not displayed. On the other hand, the content can be revealed much more quickly. Note that setting ''animate="yes"'' will also force ''retain="yes"''.


! Examples

!!Example 1

```
<<slider "How are you?" "Fine, thanks!" "h3" >>
```
Gives this:

<<slider "How are you?" "Fine, thanks!" "h3" >>

!!Example 2

The first level sliders on the "Features" tab are created with the following code (see [[tiddler|$:/_tw-scholars/tab/features]]) :

```
!Features

<$list filter="[[$:/_tw-scholars/tab/features]listed[parent]!has[draft.of]sort[description]]">

<$macrocall $name="accordion" caption={{!!description}} body={{!!title}} heading="h2" state="popup"/>

</$list>
```

</div>






The list of publications of an author (if any) is shown at the bottom of its tiddler.

See [[$:/_tw-scholars/ViewTemplate/person/publications]]






The default subtitle (modifier + modified date) is disabled. But the fields `subtitle`, `publication_title` & `chapter_title` are displayed in view mode as big, grey subtitles. 

Persons' tiddlers show their dates and places of birth and death.

See [[$:/_tw-scholars/ViewTemplate/subtitle]].






The main feature of //~TiddlyWiki for Scholars// is its tabs bar at the bottom of each tiddler. Each tab shows relevant information related to the current tiddler. And the list of tabs is specific to each tiddler's contents type. For example, "note tiddlers" and "quote tiddlers" have different lists of tabs. Several predefined tabs allow an easy and fast creation of new tiddlers related to the current one.







System tags (with prefix `$:/`) are hidden in view mode for regular tiddlers and displayed for system and shadow tiddlers.

The contents of the list fields `authors`, `source`, `parent` & `about` are displayed as tags in view mode before the "regular" tags.

See [[$:/_tw-scholars/ViewTemplate/tags]].














\define couleur(name)
<$transclude tiddler="$:/_tw-scholars/palette" index="$name$"/>
\end







\define new-journal(type:"journal",about:"Journal",dateTitle,tags,description,text,dateTime,edit)
<$setfield set="!!datetime" setTo="$dateTime$" >
<$setfield set="!!about" setTo="[[$about$]]" >

<$setfield set="!!description" setTo="$description$" >
<$setfield set="$:/temp/$type$!!description" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!text" setTo="$text$" >
<$setfield set="$:/temp/$type$!!text" setTo="">


<$setfield set="$:/temp/$type$!!tags" setTo="">


<$maketid  title="$dateTitle$" tags="$:/_type/journal $tags$" template="$:/_template/$type$" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
<$button message="tw-new-tiddler"><<trad "add">></$button>
</$maketid>


</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
\end

\define journalHere()
<$macrocall $name="new-journal" 
   type="journal" 
   about={{!!title}} 
   dateTitle=<<dateTime '0DD-0MM-YYYY 0hh:0mm'>> 
   tags={{$:/temp/journal!!tags}} 
   description={{$:/temp/journal!!description}} 
   text={{$:/temp/journal!!text}} 
   dateTime=<<dateTime 'YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ss'>>
   edit={{$:/temp/journal!!edit}}
   />
\end

<<journalHere>>







\define trad(data)
\define trad2(language) <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$language$/myTabs##$data$" text="">{{$language$/myTabs##$data$}}</$reveal><$reveal type="match" state="$language$/myTabs##$data$" text="">$data$</$reveal>

<$reveal type="match" state="$:/language" text="$:/languages/en-GB">
    $data$
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/language" text="$:/languages/en-GB">
    <$reveal type="match" state={{$:/language}} text="">
        $data$
    </$reveal>
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state={{$:/language}} text="">
        <$macrocall $name="trad2" language={{$:/language}}/>
    </$reveal>
</$reveal>
\end

<<trad "This is a translation macro">>






\define text(body,filter)

$body$

\end
\define tiddler(body)

<$transclude tiddler="$body$"/>

\end
\define sliderCode(bodyType,stateText,topoi,caption,body,heading:"h1",retain:"no",animate:"no",btn-class:"btn-invisible",btn-pressed-class:"btn-invisible",btn-style:"",btn-pressed-style:"",body-class:"",body-style:"",btn-tooltip:"Click to show the contents of this slider",btn-pressed-tooltip:"Click to hide",link-tooltip:"Open this section",link,filter)

<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<qualify '$:/state$topoi$'>> text="$stateText$">
    <$heading$>
        <span title="$btn-tooltip$">
                <$button set=<<qualify '$:/state$topoi$'>> setTo="$stateText$" class="$btn-class$" style="$btn-style$">
                    <small><small>{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}</small></small> $caption$
                </$button>
        </span>
    </$heading$>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<qualify '$:/state$topoi$'>> text="$stateText$">
    <$heading$>
        <span title="$btn-pressed-tooltip$">
                <$button set=<<qualify '$:/state$topoi$'>> setTo="" class="$btn-pressed-class$" style="$btn-pressed-style$">
                    <small>{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}</small>$caption$
                </$button> $link$
        </span>
    </$heading$>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<qualify '$:/state$topoi$'>> text="$stateText$" retain="$retain$" animate="$animate$">
<div class="$body-class$">
<span style="$body-style$">

    <<$bodyType$ "$body$" "$filter$">>

</span>
</div>
</$reveal>

\end




\define slider(caption,body,heading,retain:"no",animate:"no",btn-class:"btn-invisible",btn-pressed-class:"btn-invisible",btn-style:"",btn-pressed-style:"",body-class:"",body-style:"",btn-tooltip,btn-pressed-tooltip,format:"",template:"",link,link-tooltip)

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$body$!!created" text="">
    <$reveal type="match" state="$body$!!$caption$" text="">
        <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
            bodyType="tiddler" 
            stateText={{!!modified}}  
            topoi={{!!modified}}
            caption="$caption$" 
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
            link="<small><small><$link to='$body$'>…</$link></small></small>"
            link-tooltip="link-tooltip" 
        />
    </$reveal>
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$body$!!$caption$" text="">
        <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
            bodyType="tiddler" 
            stateText={{!!modified}}  
            topoi={{!!modified}}
            caption="<$view tiddler='$body$' field='$caption$' format='$format$' template='$template$'/>"
            body="$body$"
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
            link="<small><small><$link to='$body$'>…</$link></small></small>"
            link-tooltip="link-tooltip" 
        />
    </$reveal>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="match" state="$body$!!created" text="">
    <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
        bodyType="text" 
        stateText="$caption$"  
        topoi="/$caption$"
        caption="$caption$" 
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
    />
</$reveal>
\end


\define accordion(caption,body,heading,retain:"no",animate:"no",btn-class:"btn-invisible",btn-pressed-class:"btn-invisible",btn-style:"",btn-pressed-style:"",body-class:"",body-style:"",btn-tooltip,btn-pressed-tooltip,format:"",template:"",link,link-tooltip)

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$body$!!created" text="">
    <$reveal type="match" state="$body$!!$caption$" text="">
        <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
            bodyType="tiddler" 
            stateText={{!!modified}}  
            topoi=""
            caption="$caption$" 
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
            link="<small><small><$link to='$body$'>…</$link></small></small>"
            link-tooltip="link-tooltip" 
        />
    </$reveal>
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$body$!!$caption$" text="">
        <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
            bodyType="tiddler" 
            stateText={{!!modified}}  
            topoi=""
            caption="<$view tiddler='$body$' field='$caption$' format='$format$' template='$template$'/>"
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
            link="<small><small><$link to='$body$'>…</$link></small></small>"
            link-tooltip="link-tooltip" 
        />
    </$reveal>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="match" state="$body$!!created" text="">
    <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
        bodyType="text" 
        stateText="$caption$"  
        topoi=""
        caption="$caption$" 
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
    />
</$reveal>
\end







\define newHere_button2(type,icon:"$:/_images/note",note_title,source,about,chapter,page_alpha,page_omega,description,text,tags,edit:"show",tempTiddler:"$:/temp/note",type="$:/_type/note",template:"$:/_template/note",label:"add",class,language)

<$setfield set="!!icon" setTo="$icon$">
<$setfield set="!!chapter" setTo="$chapter$">
<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!chapter" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!page_alpha" setTo="$page_alpha$">
<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!page_alpha" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!page_omega" setTo="$page_omega$">
<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!page_omega" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!description" setTo="$description$">
<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!description" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!about" setTo="$about$">
<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!about" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!source" setTo="[[$source$]]">
<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!source" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!text" setTo="$text$">
<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!text" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!tabs" setTo="$:/_tw-scholars/tabs!!$type$">

<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!tags" setTo="">

<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!note_title" setTo="">

<$set name="label" value={{$language$/myTabs##$label$}} >

<$list filter="[[$tempTiddler$]note_title[]]">
    <$maketid  title="$source$ - $type$" tags="$:/_type/$type$ $tags$" template="$template$" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
        <$button message="tw-new-tiddler" class="$class$"><<trad "$label$">></$button>
    </$maketid>
</$list>

<$list filter="[[$tempTiddler$]!note_title[]]">
    <$maketid  title="$note_title$" tags="$:/_type/$type$ $tags$" template="$template$" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
        <$button message="tw-new-tiddler" class="$class$"><<trad "$label$">></$button>
    </$maketid>
</$list>

</$set>

</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
\end

\define newHere_button(type:"note",label:"add",class)
<$macrocall $name="newHere_button2" 
source={{!!title}} 
icon="$:/_images/$type$" 
note_title={{$:/temp/$type$!!note_title}} 
about={{$:/temp/$type$!!about}} 
chapter={{$:/temp/$type$!!chapter}} 
page_alpha={{$:/temp/$type$!!page_alpha}} 
page_omega={{$:/temp/$type$!!page_omega}} 
description={{$:/temp/$type$!!description}} 
text={{$:/temp/$type$!!text}} 
tags={{$:/temp/$type$!!tags}} 
edit={{$:/temp/$type$!!edit}} 
tempTiddler="$:/temp/$type$" 
type="$type$" 
template="$:/_template/$type$" 
label="$label$" 
class="$class$" 
language={{$:/language}}/>
\end

<<newHere_button>>






\define button1(setpersons,setpersonsEnd,authors_list,authors_title,setPubInfo,setPubInfoEnd,setCommonInfo,setCommonInfoEnd,title,tags,icon,label,template,edit)

<$setfield set="!!icon" setTo="$icon$">

<$setfield set="!!authors" setTo="$authors_list$">

<$setfield set="!!authors_title" setTo="$authors_title$">


$setpersons$

$setPubInfo$

$setCommonInfo$

;$title$

<$maketid  title="$title$" tags="[[$:/_type/publication]] $tags$" template="$template$" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
<$button message="tw-new-tiddler">$label$</$button>
</$maketid>


$setCommonInfoEnd$

$setPubInfoEnd$

$setpersonsEnd$

</$setfield>

</$setfield>

</$setfield>
\end


\define button2(type,number,title,authors_title,authors_list,publication_date,publication_title,label:"add")
<$macrocall $name="button1"
   setpersons={{$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/publication/macro/button/set$number$persons}}
   setpersonsEnd={{$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/publication/macro/button/set$number$personsEnd}}
   setPubInfo={{$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/publication/macro/button/pubInfo/$type$}}
   setPubInfoEnd={{$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/publication/macro/button/pubInfoEnd/$type$}}
   setCommonInfo={{$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/publication/macro/button/commonInfo}}
   setCommonInfoEnd={{$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/publication/macro/button/commonInfoEnd}}
   authors_title="$authors_title$"
   authors_list="$authors_list$"
   title="$authors_title$$publication_date$: $publication_title$"
   tags={{$:/temp/publication!!tags}}
   icon="$:/_images/$type$"
   label="$label$"
   template="$:/_template/$type$"
   edit={{$:/temp/publication!!edit}}
/>
\end


\define article_title(type,number,authors_title,authors_list,publication_title,publication_date,label)
<$macrocall $name="button2"
   type="$type$"
   authors_title="$authors_title$"
   authors_list="$authors_list$"
   publication_date=" ($publication_date$)"
   publication_title="“$publication_title$”"
   number="$number$"
   label="$label$"/>
\end


\define book_title(type,number,authors_title,authors_list,publication_title,publication_date,label)
<$macrocall $name="button2"
   type="$type$"
   authors_title="$authors_title$"
   authors_list="$authors_list$"
   publication_date=" ($publication_date$)"
   publication_title="$publication_title$"
   number="$number$"
   label="$label$"
/>
\end

\define 1persons_title(type,person1_name,person1_surname,label)
<$macrocall $name="$type$_title"
   type="$type$"
   number="1" 
   authors_title="$person1_surname$" 
   authors_list="[[$person1_name$ $person1_surname$]]" 
   publication_title={{$:/temp/publication!!publication_title}} 
   publication_date={{$:/temp/publication!!publication_date}}
   label="$label$"/>
\end

\define 2persons_title(type,person1_name,person1_surname,person2_name,person2_surname,label)
<$macrocall $name="$type$_title"
   type="$type$"
   number="2" 
   authors_title="$person1_surname$ & $person2_surname$" 
   authors_list="[[$person1_name$ $person1_surname$]] [[$person2_name$ $person2_surname$]]" 
   publication_title={{$:/temp/publication!!publication_title}} 
   publication_date={{$:/temp/publication!!publication_date}}
   label="$label$"/>
\end

\define 3persons_title(type,person1_name,person1_surname,person2_name,person2_surname,person3_name,person3_surname,label)
<$macrocall $name="$type$_title"
   type="$type$"
   number="3" 
   authors_title="$person1_surname$, $person2_surname$ & $person3_surname$" 
   authors_list="[[$person1_name$ $person1_surname$]] [[$person2_name$ $person2_surname$]] [[$person3_name$ $person3_surname$]]" 
   publication_title={{$:/temp/publication!!publication_title}} 
   publication_date={{$:/temp/publication!!publication_date}}
   label="$label$"/>
\end

\define 4persons_title(type,person1_name,person1_surname,person2_name,person2_surname,person3_name,person3_surname,person4_name,person4_surname,label)
<$macrocall $name="$type$_title"
   type="$type$"
   number="4" 
   authors_title="$person1_surname$ et al." 
   authors_list="[[$person1_name$ $person1_surname$]] [[$person2_name$ $person2_surname$]] [[$person3_name$ $person3_surname$]] [[$person4_name$ $person4_surname$]]" 
   publication_title={{$:/temp/publication!!publication_title}} 
   publication_date={{$:/temp/publication!!publication_date}}
   label="$label$"/>
\end

\define authors_title(type,number,label:"add")
<$macrocall $name="$number$persons_title" 
   type="$type$"
   person1_name={{!!person_name}} 
   person1_surname={{!!person_surname}} 
   person2_name={{$:/temp/publication!!person2_name}} 
   person2_surname={{$:/temp/publication!!person2_surname}} 
   person3_name={{$:/temp/publication!!person3_name}} 
   person3_surname={{$:/temp/publication!!person3_surname}}  
   person4_name={{$:/temp/publication!!person4_name}} 
   person4_surname={{$:/temp/publication!!person4_surname}} 
   label="$label$"/>
\end


\define listFilters(type,label)
<$set name="thisTiddler" value=<<currentTiddler>> >
 <$list filter="[all[current]!person_surname[]]">
        <$list filter="[[$:/temp/publication]person2_surname[]person3_surname[]person4_surname[]]">
            <$tiddler tiddler=<<thisTiddler>> >
                <<authors_title "$type$" "1" "$label$">>
            </$tiddler>
        </$list>
        <$list filter="[[$:/temp/publication]!person2_surname[]person3_surname[]person4_surname[]]">
            <$tiddler tiddler=<<thisTiddler>> >
                <<authors_title "$type$" "2" "$label$">>
            </$tiddler>
        </$list>
        <$list filter="[[$:/temp/publication]!person2_surname[]!person3_surname[]person4_surname[]]">
            <$tiddler tiddler=<<thisTiddler>> >
                <<authors_title "$type$" "3" "$label$">>
            </$tiddler>
         </$list>
        <$list filter="[[$:/temp/publication]!person2_surname[]!person3_surname[]!person4_surname[]]">
            <$tiddler tiddler=<<thisTiddler>> >
                <<authors_title "$type$" "4" "$label$">>
            </$tiddler>
        </$list>
    </$list>
</$set>
\end


\define newHere_pubButton(type,label)
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/temp/publication!!publication_title" text="">
<<listFilters "$type$" "$label$">>
</$reveal>
\end



<<newHere_pubButton "article" "add article">>







\define person_name(number,default,placeholder:"prénom") <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/publication" field="person$number$_name" default=$default$ placeholder=$default$ class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="10"/>

\define person_surname(number,default) <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/publication" field="person$number$_surname" default=$default$ placeholder=$default$ class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="10"/>

\define newHere_pubTable2(type,invariable)
<$reveal type="match" state="!!table_state" text="">

|!<br>person<br>  |<|{{!!person_name}}|<|{{!!person_surname}}|<|<|<|<| <$button set="!!table_state" setTo="show person 2" class="btn-invisible"> + </$button> |
$type$
$invariable$

</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state="!!table_state" text="show person 2">

|^!<br>authors<br>  |! <br>1<br>  |{{!!person_name}}|<|{{!!person_surname}}|<|<|<|<| <$button set="!!table_state" setTo="show person 3" class="btn-invisible">+</$button> |
|~|! 2 |<<person_name "2" "prénom">>|<|<<person_surname "2" "nom">>|<|<|<|<| <$button set="!!table_state" setTo="" class="btn-invisible">–</$button> |
$type$
$invariable$

</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state="!!table_state" text="show person 3">

|^!<br>authors<br>  |!<br>1<br>  |{{!!person_name}}|<|{{!!person_surname}}|<|<|<|<| <$button set="!!table_state" setTo="show person 4" class="btn-invisible">+</$button> |
|~|! 2 |<<person_name "2" "prénom">>|<|<<person_surname "2" "nom">>|<|<|<|<| <$button set="!!table_state" setTo="show person 2" class="btn-invisible">–</$button> |
|~|! 3 |<<person_name "3" "prénom">>|<|<<person_surname "3" "nom">>|<|<|<|<|~|
$type$
$invariable$

</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state="!!table_state" text="show person 4">

|^!<br>authors<br>  |!<br>1<br>  |{{!!person_name}}|<|{{!!person_surname}}|<|<|<|<| <$button set="!!table_state" setTo="show person 3" class="btn-invisible">–</$button> |
|~|! 2 |<<person_name "2" "prénom">>|<|<<person_surname "2" "nom">>|<|<|<|<|~|
|~|! 3 |<<person_name "3" "prénom">>|<|<<person_surname "3" "nom">>|<|<|<|<|~|
|~|! 4 |<<person_name "4" "prénom">>|<|<<person_surname "4" "nom">>|<|<|<|<|~|
$type$
$invariable$
</$reveal>
\end

\define newHere_pubTable(type) <$macrocall $name="newHere_pubTable2" type={{$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/publication/table/$type$}} invariable={{$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/publication/table/invariable}}/>







\define publicationsList()

\define title(type) {{$:/_images/$type$}} <$link to={{!!title}}><$reveal type="match" state="!!publication_type" text="article">“</$reveal><$view field="publication_title"/><$reveal type="match" state="!!publication_type" text="article">”</$reveal><$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!publication_date" text="">, <$view field="publication_date"/></$reveal></$link>

<$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]tag[$:/_type/person]]">
    <$list filter="[all[current]listed[]tag[$:/_type/publication]!has[draft.of]] [all[current]listed[authors]tag[$:/_type/publication]!has[draft.of]] +[sort[publication_date]]">
        <div class="tw-menu-list-subitem">
        <$macrocall $name="title" type={{!!publication_type}}/>
        </div>
    </$list>
</$list>
\end

<$setfield set="$:/temp/concept!!tags" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!description" setTo="$description$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/concept!!description" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!authors" setTo="$authors$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/concept!!authors" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!source" setTo="$source$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/concept!!source" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!parent" setTo="$parent$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/concept!!parent" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!text" setTo="$text$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/concept!!text" setTo="">

<$set name="label" value={{$language$/myTabs##$label$}} >

    <$maketid  title="$concept_name$" tags="$:/_type/concept $tags$" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
        <$button message="tw-new-tiddler" class="$class$"><<trad "$label$">></$button>
    </$maketid>

</$set>

</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>

</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
\end

\define sideBar_button2(type,icon:"$:/_images/note",note_title,about,description,text,tags,edit:"show",tempTiddler:"$:/temp/note",type="$:/_type/note",template:"$:/_template/note",label:"add",class,language)

<$setfield set="!!icon" setTo="$icon$">

<$setfield set="!!description" setTo="$description$">
<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!description" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!about" setTo="$about$">
<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!about" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!text" setTo="$text$">
<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!text" setTo="">

<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!tags" setTo="">

<$setfield set="$tempTiddler$!!note_title" setTo="">

<$set name="label" value={{$language$/myTabs##$label$}} >

<$list filter="[[$tempTiddler$]note_title[]]">
    <$maketid  title="$about$ - $type$" tags="$:/_type/$type$ $tags$" template="$template$" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
        <$button message="tw-new-tiddler" class="$class$"><<trad "$label$">></$button>
    </$maketid>
</$list>

<$list filter="[[$tempTiddler$]!note_title[]]">
    <$maketid  title="$note_title$" tags="$:/_type/$type$ $tags$" template="$template$" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
        <$button message="tw-new-tiddler" class="$class$"><<trad "$label$">></$button>
    </$maketid>
</$list>

</$set>

</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
\end

\define sideBar_button(type:"note",label:"add",class)
<$macrocall $name="sideBar_button2" 
icon="$:/_images/$type$" 
note_title={{$:/temp/$type$!!note_title}} 
about={{$:/temp/$type$!!about}} 
description={{$:/temp/$type$!!description}} 
text={{$:/temp/$type$!!text}} 
tags={{$:/temp/$type$!!tags}} 
edit={{$:/temp/$type$!!edit}} 
tempTiddler="$:/temp/$type$" 
type="$type$" 
template="$:/_template/$type$" 
label="$label$" 
class="$class$" 
language={{$:/language}}/>
\end

\define newPerson_button2(person_type,person_name,person_surname,birthdate,birthplace,deathdate,deathplace,picture_file,edit:"show",tags,label,class,language,color)

<$setfield set="!!icon" setTo="$:/_images/person">

<$setfield set="!!color" setTo="$color$">

<$setfield set="!!person_type" setTo="$person_type$">

<$setfield set="!!person_name" setTo="$person_name$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/person!!person_name" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!person_surname" setTo="$person_surname$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/person!!person_surname" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!birthdate" setTo="$birthdate$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/person!!birthdate" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!birthplace" setTo="$birthplace$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/person!!birthplace" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!deathdate" setTo="$deathdate$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/person!!deathdate" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!deathplace" setTo="$deathplace$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/person!!deathplace" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!picture_file" setTo={{$:/temp/person!!picture_file}}>
<$setfield set="$:/temp/person!!picture_file" setTo="">

<$set name="label" value={{$language$/myTabs##$label$}} >

    <$maketid  title="$person_name$ $person_surname$" tags="$:/_type/person $tags$" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
        <$button message="tw-new-tiddler" class="$class$"><<trad "$label$">></$button>
    </$maketid>

</$set>

</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
\end

\define newTheory_button2(theory_name,description,authors,source,parent,tags,text,label,edit,class,language,color)

<$setfield set="!!color" setTo="$color$">

<$setfield set="!!description" setTo="$description$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/theory!!description" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!authors" setTo="$authors$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/theory!!authors" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!source" setTo="$source$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/theory!!source" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!parent" setTo="$parent$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/theory!!parent" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!text" setTo="$text$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/theory!!text" setTo="">

<$set name="label" value={{$language$/myTabs##$label$}} >

    <$maketid  title="$theory_name$" tags="$:/_type/theory $tags$" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
        <$button message="tw-new-tiddler" class="$class$"><<trad "$label$">></$button>
    </$maketid>

</$set>

</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>

</$setfield>
</$setfield>

<<newTheory_button>>






\define text(body,alt-body)

$alt-body$

$body$

\end
\define tiddler(body,alt-body)

$alt-body$

<$transclude tiddler="$body$"/>

\end
\define sliderCode(bodyType,stateText,topoi,caption,body,heading:"h1",retain:"no",animate:"no",btn-class:"btn-invisible",btn-pressed-class:"btn-invisible",btn-style:"",btn-pressed-style:"",body-class:"",body-style:"",btn-tooltip:"Click to show the contents of this slider",btn-pressed-tooltip:"Click to hide",link-tooltip,link,filter,alt-body)
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<qualify '$:/state$topoi$'>> text="$stateText$">
    <$heading$>
        <span title="$btn-tooltip$">
                <$button set=<<qualify '$:/state$topoi$'>> setTo="$stateText$" class="$btn-class$" style="$btn-style$">
                    <small><small>{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}</small></small> $caption$
                </$button>
        </span>
    </$heading$>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<qualify '$:/state$topoi$'>> text="$stateText$">
    <$heading$>
        <span title="$btn-pressed-tooltip$">
                <$button set=<<qualify '$:/state$topoi$'>> setTo="" class="$btn-pressed-class$" style="$btn-pressed-style$">
                    <small>{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}</small>$caption$
                </$button><$link to='$body$'>$link$</$link>
        </span>
    </$heading$>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<qualify '$:/state$topoi$'>> text="$stateText$" retain="$retain$" animate="$animate$">
<div class="$body-class$">
<span style="$body-style$">

    <<$bodyType$ "$body$" "$alt-body$">>

</span>
</div>
</$reveal>

\end




\define slider(caption,body,heading,retain:"no",animate:"no",btn-class:"btn-invisible",btn-pressed-class:"btn-invisible",btn-style:"",btn-pressed-style:"",body-class:"",body-style:"",btn-tooltip,btn-pressed-tooltip,format:"",template:"",link,link-tooltip:"Open this section",alt-body)
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$body$!!modified" text="">
    <$reveal type="match" state="$body$!!$caption$" text="">
        <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
            bodyType="tiddler" 
            stateText={{!!modified}}  
            topoi={{!!modified}}
            caption="$caption$" 
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
            link="$link$"
            link-tooltip="$link-tooltip$" 
            alt-body="$alt-body$" 
        />
    </$reveal>
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$body$!!$caption$" text="">
        <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
            bodyType="tiddler" 
            stateText={{!!modified}}  
            topoi={{!!modified}}
            caption="<$view tiddler='$body$' field='$caption$' format='$format$' template='$template$'/>"
            body="$body$"
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
            link="$link$"
            link-tooltip="$link-tooltip$" 
            alt-body="$alt-body$" 
        />
    </$reveal>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state="$body$!!modified" text="">
    <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
        bodyType="text" 
        stateText="$caption$"  
        topoi="/$caption$"
        caption="$caption$" 
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
            alt-body="$alt-body$" 
    />
</$reveal>
\end


\define accordion(caption,body,heading,retain:"no",animate:"no",btn-class:"btn-invisible",btn-pressed-class:"btn-invisible",btn-style:"",btn-pressed-style:"",body-class:"",body-style:"",btn-tooltip,btn-pressed-tooltip,format:"",template:"",link:"<small><small> …</small></small>",link-tooltip:"Open this section",alt-body)

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$body$!!modified" text="">
    <$reveal type="match" state="$body$!!$caption$" text="">

        <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
            bodyType="tiddler" 
            stateText={{!!modified}}  
            topoi=""
            caption="$caption$" 
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
            link="$link$"
            link-tooltip="$link-tooltip$" 
            alt-body="$alt-body$"
        />

    </$reveal>
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$body$!!$caption$" text="">

        <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
            bodyType="tiddler" 
            stateText={{!!modified}}  
            topoi=""
            caption="<$view tiddler='$body$' field='$caption$' format='$format$' template='$template$'/>"
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
            link="$link$"
            link-tooltip="$link-tooltip$" 
            alt-body="$alt-body$"
        />

    </$reveal>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="match" state="$body$!!modified" text="">

    <$macrocall $name="sliderCode" 
        bodyType="text" 
        stateText="$caption$"  
        topoi=""
        caption="$caption$" 
            body="$body$"
            heading="$heading$"
            retain="$retain$"
            animate="$animate$"
            btn-class="$btn-class$"
            btn-pressed-class="$btn-pressed-class$"
            btn-style="$btn-style$"
            btn-pressed-style="$btn-pressed-style$"
            body-class="$body-class$"
            body-style="$body-style$"
            btn-tooltip="$btn-tooltip$"
            btn-pressed-tooltip="$btn-pressed-tooltip$"
            alt-body="$alt-body$"
    />
</$reveal>
\end







\define editSelector(type:"publication")
<$radio tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="edit" value="yes"> <<trad "yes">></$radio>&nbsp;&nbsp;
<$radio tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="edit" value="no"> <<trad "no">></$radio>&nbsp;&nbsp;
<$radio tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="edit" value="show"> <<trad "show">> (<<trad "default">>)</$radio>
\end

\define input(type:"publication",field,size:"60",placeholder:"") <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="$type$_$field$" placeholder="$placeholder$" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="$size$"/>

\define page(type:"publication",field,size:"6",placeholder) <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="page_$field$" placeholder="$placeholder$" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="$size$"/>







\define tabCaption(type) <small><$count filter=<<tabFilter "$type$">>/>/<$count filter="[all[current]tagging[]] [all[current]listed[source]listed[about]] [all[current]listed[source]listed[source]] [all[current]listed[source]listed[parent]] [all[current]listed[source]tagging[]] [all[current]listed[about]listed[about]] [all[current]listed[about]listed[parent]] [all[current]listed[about]tagging[]] [all[current]listed[parent]listed[about]] [all[current]listed[parent]listed[parent]] [all[current]listed[parent]tagging[]] +[tag[$:/_type/$type$]!title{!!title}!is[system]!has[draft.of]]"/></small>







\define tabColor() 







\define tabContents2(type,heading,tags:"[all[current]list[!!about]] [all[current]list[!!parent]] [all[current]list[!!source]]",class:"",this:"")

<h1><$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/_images/$type$" text="">{{$:/_images/$type$}} </$reveal><<trad "$heading$">></h1>

<$list filter=<<tabFilter "$type$">> emptyMessage="none">

<h2><$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/></$link></h2>

<h3><$transclude field="description"/></h3>

<$list filter="$tags$ -[title[$this$]]" template="tag"/><$list filter="[all[current]tags[]!is[system]]" template="tag"/>

<<<$class$

{{!!text}}

<<<

<br>

</$list>


<h1><$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/_images/$type$" text="">{{$:/_images/$type$}} </$reveal><<trad "Related $heading$">></h1>

<$list filter="[all[current]tagging[]] [all[current]listed[source]listed[about]] [all[current]listed[source]listed[source]] [all[current]listed[source]listed[parent]] [all[current]listed[source]tagging[]] [all[current]listed[about]listed[about]] [all[current]listed[about]listed[parent]] [all[current]listed[about]tagging[]] [all[current]listed[parent]listed[about]] [all[current]listed[parent]listed[parent]] [all[current]listed[parent]tagging[]] +[tag[$:/_type/$type$]!title{!!title}!is[system]!has[draft.of]]" emptyMessage="none">

<h2><$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/></$link></h2>

<h3><$transclude field="description"/></h3>

<$list filter="$tags$ -[title[$this$]]" template="tag"/><$list filter="[all[current]tags[]!is[system]]" template="tag"/>

<<<$class$

{{!!text}}

<<<

<br>

</$list>

\end

\define tabContents(type,heading,tags:"[all[current]list[!!about]] [all[current]list[!!parent]] [all[current]list[!!source]]",class:"")
<$macrocall $name="tabContents2" 
   type="$type$" 
   heading="$heading$" 
   tags="$tags$" 
   class="$class$" 
   this={{!!title}} />
\end







\define tabFilter(type)
[all[current]listed[authors]tag[$:/_type/publication]listed[source]] [all[current]listed[authors]tag[$:/_type/publication]listed[about]] [all[current]listed[source]] [all[current]listed[about]] [all[current]listed[parent]] +[tag[$:/_type/$type$]!title{!!title}!is[system]!has[draft.of]nsort[page_alpha]]
\end








\define tabSlider(type,header,addLabel:"add",addTooltip:"add a new tiddler",cancelTooltip:"Cancel adding new tiddler.",cancelLabel:{{$:/core/images/cancel-button}})
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!slider" text="show">
<span title="$addTooltip$" style="float:right;position:relative;top:10px;"  class="tw-tiddler-controls">
<$button set="!!slider" setTo="show" class="btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/new-button}}</$button>
</span>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="match" state="!!slider" text="show">

<span title="$cancelTooltip$" style="float:right;position:relative;top:10px;"><$button class="btn-invisible" set="!!slider" setTo="hide"><<trad "$cancelLabel$">></$button></span>

!<<trad "$header$">>

<<newHere_table "$type$">>

<<newHere_button "$type$" "$addLabel$" "$addClass$">>

<br><br><br><hr>

</$reveal>
\end







\define scholarsTabs(field,this) <$list filter="[list[$:/_tw-scholars/tabs!!$field$]] [[$(this)$]tags[]prefix[$:/_tw-scholars/tab/]]"/>
\define tabsField(type,this)
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/_tw-scholars/tabs!!$type$" text="">
    <$macrocall $name="scholarsTabs" field="$type$"/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state="$:/_tw-scholars/tabs!!$type$" text="">
    <$tiddler tiddler="$(this)$">
        <$macrocall $name="scholarsTabs" field={{!!$type$_type}}/>
    </$tiddler>
</$reveal>
\end
\define tabsList()
<$set name="this" value=<<currentTiddler>> >
    <$reveal type="match" state="!!tabs_list" text="">
        <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]removeprefix[$:/_type/]]">
            <$macrocall $name="tabsField" type={{!!title}}/>
        </$list>
    </$reveal>
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!tabs_list" text="">
        <$macrocall $name="tabsField" type={{!!tabs_list}}/>
    </$reveal>
</$set>
\end







\define newChapterButton(source,authors_title,publication_date,chapter_title,order,page_alpha,page_omega,about,description,text,tags,edit:"show",label:"add")

<$setfield set="!!icon" setTo="$:/_images/chapter">
<$setfield set="!!order" setTo="$order$">
<$setfield set="!!page_alpha" setTo="$page_alpha$">
<$setfield set="!!page_omega" setTo="$page_omega$">

<$setfield set="!!chapter_title" setTo="$chapter_title$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/chapter!!chapter_title" setTo="">
<$setfield set="!!source" setTo="[[$source$]]">
<$setfield set="!!text" setTo="$text$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/chapter!!text" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!about" setTo="$about$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/chapter!!about" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!description" setTo="$description$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/chapter!!description" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!tabs" setTo="$:/_tw-scholars/tabs!!chapter">

<$setfield set="$:/temp/chapter!!tags" setTo="">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/chapter!!order" setTo="">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/chapter!!page_alpha" setTo="">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/chapter!!page_omega" setTo="">

<$maketid  title="$authors_title$ $publication_date$: chap. $order$" tags="$:/_type/chapter $tags$" template="$:/_template/chapter" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
<$button message="tw-new-tiddler"><<trad "$label$">></$button>
</$maketid>

</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
\end

\define newChapter(label:"add")
<$macrocall $name="newChapterButton" 
   source={{!!title}}
   authors_title={{!!authors_title}} 
   publication_date={{!!publication_date}}
   order={{$:/temp/chapter!!order}} 
   chapter_title={{$:/temp/chapter!!chapter_title}} 
   about={{$:/temp/chapter!!about}} 
   description={{$:/temp/chapter!!description}} 
   text={{$:/temp/chapter!!text}} 
   tags={{$:/temp/chapter!!tags}} 
   page_alpha={{$:/temp/chapter!!page_alpha}} 
   page_omega={{$:/temp/chapter!!page_omega}} 
   edit={{$:/temp/chapter!!edit}} 
   label=$label$/> 
\end

<<newChapter>>

\define noPubMacro_editTitle(type:"note",placeholder)
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="note_title" tag="input" placeholder="$placeholder$"  class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="60"/>
\end

\define noPubMacro(tiddlerTitle,type:"note") <<noPubMacro_editTitle "$type$" "$tiddlerTitle$ - $type$ (default title)">>

\define newHere_table(type:"note")
|!<br><<trad "Source">><br>  |{{!!title}}|<|<|<|<|<|
|!<<trad "Pages">> |<<page "$type$" "alpha" "" "from">>|<|<<page "$type$" "omega" "" "to">>|<| !<<trad "Chapter">>|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="chapter" tag="input" placeholder="n°" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="2"/>|
|!<<trad "$type$ title">> |<$macrocall $name="noPubMacro" tiddlerTitle={{!!title}} type="$type$"/>|<|<|<|<|<|
|!<<trad "Description">> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="description" tag="input" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="60"/>|<|<|<|<|<|
|!<<trad "About">> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="about" tag="input" placeholder="[[tag name]]" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="60"/>|<|<|<|<|<|
|!<<trad "Tags">> |<$tiddler tiddler="$:/temp/$type$">{{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags}}</$tiddler>|<|<|<|<|<|
|!<<trad "Text">> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="textarea"/>|<|<|<|<|<|
|>| !<<trad "Edit tiddler">>:   <<editSelector "$type$">>|<|<|<|<|<|
\end

<<newHere_table>>

<$radio field="add" value="article"> {{$:/_images/article}} Article</$radio><br>

</$reveal>

|>|!Title |<<input "publication" "title" "60">>|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|
|>|!Journal |<<input "publication" "journal" "60">>|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|
|>|!Volume          |<<input "publication" "volume" "3">>| !Issue|<<input "publication" "issue" "3">>| !Date|<<input "publication" "date" "3">>| !pages|<<page "publication" "alpha" "3" "first">>|<<page "publication" "omega" "3" "last">>|






|>|!<<trad "Title">> |<<input "publication" "title" "60">>|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|
|>|!<<trad "Subtitle">> |<<input "publication" "subtitle" "60">>|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|
|>|!<<trad "Publisher">>      |<<input "publication" "publisher" "18">>|<| !<<trad "Vol.">>|<<input "publication" "volume" "1">>| !<<trad "Edition">>|<<input "publication" "edition" "1">>| !<<trad "Year">>|<<input "publication" "date" "4">>|






| |<|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|
|>|!<<trad "Description">> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/publication" field="description" placeholder="a short description of the publication" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="60"/>|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|
|>|!<<trad "About">> / <<trad "Topics">> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/publication" field="about" placeholder="[[tag name]]" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="60"/>|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|
|>|!<<trad "Tags">> |<$tiddler tiddler="$:/temp/publication">{{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags}}</$tiddler>|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|
|>|!<<trad "Abstract">> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/publication" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="textarea"/>|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|
|>| !<<trad "Edit tiddler">>:   <<editSelector "publication">>|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|<|







\define page_omega() <$list filter="[[$:/temp/newQuote]!page_omega[]]">-{{!!page_omega}}</$list>

<h1><<trad "New quote">></h1>

{{||$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/quote/table}}
{{||$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/quote/button}}






\define newQuoteButton(source,about,authors_title,authors_list,current_title,publication_title,chapter,page_alpha,page_omega,pages,description,publication_date,text,tags,edit:"show",label:"add")

<$setfield set="!!icon" setTo="$:/_images/quote">
<$setfield set="!!publication_title" setTo="$publication_title$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/quote!!publication_title" setTo="">
<$setfield set="!!chapter" setTo="$chapter$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/quote!!chapter" setTo="">
<$setfield set="!!page_alpha" setTo="$page_alpha$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/quote!!page_alpha" setTo="">
<$setfield set="!!page_omega" setTo="$page_omega$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/quote!!page_omega" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!description" setTo="$description$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/quote!!description" setTo="">
<$setfield set="!!publication_date" setTo="$publication_date$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/quote!!publication_date" setTo="">
<$setfield set="!!authors" setTo="$authors_list$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/quote!!authors" setTo="">
<$setfield set="!!about" setTo="$about$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/quote!!about" setTo="">

<$setfield set="!!source" setTo="[[$current_title$]]">

<$setfield set="!!text" setTo="$text$">
<$setfield set="$:/temp/quote!!text" setTo="">

<$setfield set="$:/temp/quote!!tags" setTo="">

<$maketid  title="$authors_title$ $publication_date$: $pages$" tags="$:/_type/quote $tags$" template="$:/_template/quote" edit="$edit$" message="tw-set-field">
<$button message="tw-new-tiddler">$label$</$button>
</$maketid>

</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
</$setfield>
\end

\define newQuote1(page_alpha,label)
<$macrocall $name="newQuoteButton" 
about={{$:/temp/quote!!about}} 
authors_title={{!!authors_title}} 
authors_list={{!!authors}} 
current_title={{!!title}} 
publication_title={{!!publication_title}} 
chapter={{$:/temp/quote!!chapter}} 
page_alpha={{$:/temp/quote!!page_alpha}} 
page_omega={{$:/temp/quote!!page_omega}} 
pages="$page_alpha$"
description={{$:/temp/quote!!description}} 
text={{$:/temp/quote!!text}} 
publication_date={{!!publication_date}} 
tags={{$:/temp/quote!!tags}} 
edit={{$:/temp/quote!!edit}} 
label="$label$"/>
\end

\define newQuote2(page_alpha,page_omega,label)
<$macrocall $name="newQuoteButton" 
about={{$:/temp/quote!!about}} 
authors_title={{!!authors_title}} 
authors_list={{!!authors}} 
current_title={{!!title}} 
publication_title={{!!publication_title}} 
chapter={{$:/temp/quote!!chapter}} 
page_alpha={{$:/temp/quote!!page_alpha}} 
page_omega={{$:/temp/quote!!page_omega}} 
pages="$page_alpha$-$page_omega$"
description={{$:/temp/quote!!description}} 
text={{$:/temp/quote!!text}} 
publication_date={{!!publication_date}} 
tags={{$:/temp/quote!!tags}} 
edit={{$:/temp/quote!!edit}} 
label="$label$"/>
\end

\define newQuote(label,language)
<$set name="current" value=<<currentTiddler>> >
<$set name="label" value={{$language$/myTabs##$label$}} >
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/quote]page_omega[]]">
<$tiddler tiddler=<<current>> >
<$macrocall $name="newQuote1" page_alpha={{$:/temp/quote!!page_alpha}} label=<<label>>/>
</$tiddler>
</$list>
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/quote]!page_omega[]]">
<$tiddler tiddler=<<current>> >
<$macrocall $name="newQuote2" page_alpha={{$:/temp/quote!!page_alpha}} page_omega={{$:/temp/quote!!page_omega}} label=<<label>>/>
</$tiddler>
</$list>
</$set>
</$set>
\end

<$set name="language" value={{$:/language}}>
<$macrocall $name="newQuote" label="add" language=<<language>>>>
<$/set>







\define input(field,size,placeholder:"") <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/quote" field="$field$" placeholder="$placeholder$" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="$size$"/>


|!<<trad "Pages">> |<<page "quote" "alpha" "6" "from">>|<<page "quote" "omega" "6" "to">>| !<<trad "Chapter">>|<<input "chapter" "2" "n°">>|
|!<<trad "Description">> |<<input "description" "60" "description of the quote">>|<|<|<|
|!<<trad "About">> |<<input "about" "60" "what the quote talks about">>|<|<|<|
|!<<trad "Tags">> |<$tiddler tiddler="$:/temp/quote">{{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags}}</$tiddler>|<|<|<|
|!<<trad "Text">> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/quote" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="textarea"/>|<|<|<|
|>| !<<trad "Edit tiddler">>:   <<editSelector "quote">>|<|<|<|

</span>
</$reveal>

</$reveal>
\end

\end

<div class="tw-tab-content">

!{{$:/_images/bug}}<<trad "Known issues">>

* Using double quotes `"` in tiddler titles can breack things. Prefer typographical quotes like `« »` and `“ ”`.
* Changing the UI language gives an error message, but it doesn't seem to breack anything.
* The new note button in the sidebar creates the fields chapter and pages.
* Lots of things

</div>






\define tabJournal()
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!slider" text="show">
<span title="add a new tiddler" style="float:right;position:relative;top:14px;"  class="tw-tiddler-controls">
<$button set="!!slider" setTo="show" class="btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/new-button}}</$button>
</span>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="match" state="!!slider" text="show">

<span title="Cancel adding new tiddler." style="float:right;position:relative;top:10px;"><$button class="btn-invisible" set="!!slider" setTo="hide">{{$:/core/images/cancel-button}}</$button></span>

!<<trad "New journal">>

{{||$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/journal/table}}

<<journalHere>>

<br><br><br><hr>

</$reveal>
\end
<div class="tw-tab-content">

<<tabJournal>>

!{{$:/_images/agenda}}<<trad "Journal">>

<$list filter="[all[current]listed[about]tag[$:/_type/journal]!has[draft.of]!nsort[datetime]]">

<$macrocall $name="accordion" caption="datetime" body={{!!title}} alt-body="""
{{{ [all[current]tags[]!is[system]]||tag }}}

<h3>//{{!!description}}//</h3>

""" heading="h2" format="date" template="DDth MMM YYYY" body-class="box grey"/>


</$list>

</div>

\end

</span>

{{||$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/publication}}

</$reveal>
\end

\define newHere(addTooltip:"add a new quote",cancelTooltip:"Cancel adding new quote.",cancelLabel:{{$:/core/images/cancel-button}})

<$button set="!!slider" setTo="show" class="btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/new-button}}</$button>
</span>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state="!!slider" text="show">

<span title="$cancelTooltip$" style="float:right;position:relative;top:10px;"><$button class="btn-invisible" set="!!slider" setTo="hide"><<trad "$cancelLabel$">></$button></span>

{{||$:/_tw-scholars/newHere/quote}}

<br><br><br><hr>

</$reveal>
\end

<<newHere>>

</$reveal>

!!{{!!description}}

""" link=""/>

</div>

|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/concept" field="source" placeholder="[[Source of the concept]] (book, paper…)" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="input" size="44"/>|
| |
|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/concept" field="parent" placeholder="Parent concepts and theories" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="input" size="44"/>|

</div>






\define button(content,icon:"")
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!show" text="$content$">
    <$button set="!!show" setTo="$content$" class="btn-sidebar">
        $icon$<<trad "$content$">>
    </$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state="!!show" text="$content$">
    <$button set="!!show" setTo="" class="btn-sidebar-down">
        $icon$<<trad "$content$">>
    </$button>
</$reveal>
\end
<div class="sidebar-menu newHere">
<<button "person" "{{$:/_images/person-button}} +<br>">><<button "note" "{{$:/_images/note-button}}+<br>">><<button "idea" "{{$:/_images/idea-button}}+<br>">><<button "concept" "{{$:/_images/concept-button}}+<br>">><<button "theory" "{{$:/_images/theory-button}}+<br>">>

<div>
<$reveal type="match" state="!!show" text="person">
    {{$:/_tw-scholars/ui/SideBar/newPerson}}<br><br>
</$reveal>

    {{$:/_tw-scholars/ui/SideBar/newNote}}<br><br>
</$reveal>

</$reveal>

    {{$:/_tw-scholars/ui/SideBar/newTheory}}<br><br>
</$reveal>
</div>
</div>






<div>

|invisible|k

| New thought |
| |
|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/idea" field="note_title" placeholder="Thought title" tag="input" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="40"/>|
| |
|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/idea" field="description" placeholder="Description" tag="input" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="40"/>|
|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/idea" field="about" tag="input" placeholder="About: [[tag name]]" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="40"/>|
| |
|<$tiddler tiddler="$:/temp/idea">{{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags}}</$tiddler>|
| |
|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/idea" placeholder="Text of the thought" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="textarea"/>|
| <<trad "Edit tiddler">>:   <<editSelector "idea">>|

</div>

\define person_name(type:"person") <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="person_name" placeholder="Name" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="20"/>

\define person_surname(type:"person") <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="person_surname" placeholder="Surname" class="tw-edit-texteditor" size="20"/>

\define inputperson(type:"person",field,size:"8",placeholder) <$edit-text  tiddler="$:/temp/$type$" field="$field$" size="$size$" placeholder="$placeholder$" class="tw-edit-texteditor"/>

<div>

|invisible|k
| |||
|<$tiddler tiddler="$:/temp/person"><$radio field="person_type" value="author"> author</$radio>       <$radio field="person_type" value="student"> student</$radio></$tiddler>|<|<|
| |<|<|
|<<person_name>>|<<person_surname>>|<|
| |<|<|
|<<inputperson "person" "birthplace" "20" "birth place">>|<<inputperson "person" "birthdate" "8" "birth date">> | {{$:/_tw-scholars/ui/SideBar/newHere/person/button}}|
|<<inputperson "person" "deathplace" "20" "death place">>|<<inputperson "person" "deathdate" "8" "death date">> |~|
| |<|<|
|<<inputperson "person" "picture_file" "33" "picture's location">> |<|<|
| |<|<|
| <<trad "Edit tiddler">>:   <<editSelector "person">>|<|<|

</div>

<div>

|invisible|k
| |
| ''New theory'' |
| |
|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/theory" field="theory_name" placeholder="Name of the theory" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="input" size="44"/>|
| |
|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/theory" field="description" placeholder="Description" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="input" size="44"/> |
|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/theory" field="authors" placeholder="[[Author Name]]" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="input" size="44"/>|
|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/theory" field="source" placeholder="[[Source of the theory]] (book, paper…)" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="input" size="44"/>|
| |
|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/theory" field="parent" placeholder="Parent theories and concepts" class="tw-edit-texteditor" tag="input" size="44"/>|

<$list filter="[all[current]tag[$:/_type/course]]">
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!picture_file" text="">

<table class="logo">
<tr>
<td><$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!picture_source" text=""><a href={{!!picture_source}} target="_blank"><$image source={{!!picture_file}} tooltip={{!!picture_tooltip}} class="logo-picture"/></a></$reveal><$reveal type="match" state="!!picture_source" text=""><$image source={{!!picture_file}} tooltip={{!!picture_tooltip}} class="logo-picture"/></$reveal></td>
</tr>
<caption>{{!!picture_caption}}</caption>
</table>

</$reveal>
</$list>








<$list filter="[all[current]tag[$:/_type/course]!is[system]]">

<$reveal type="match" state="!!date_alpha" text="">
<$button set="!!date_alpha" setTo=<<dateTime "YYYY-0MM-0DD">> class="btn-big grey"><<trad "not started">></$button>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!date_alpha" text="">
    <$reveal type="match" state="!!date_omega" text="">
        <$button set="!!date_omega" setTo=<<dateTime "YYYY-0MM-0DD">> class="btn-big green"><<trad "started">></$button>
    </$reveal>
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!date_omega" text="">
        <$button set="!!date_omega" setTo="" class="btn-big red"><<trad "ended">></$button>
    </$reveal>
</$reveal>

</$list>
